get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific school by its unique ID.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a SAVETUBA_ADMIN.

404.description: Not Found if the school ID does not exist.

put.description: Updates a school's details, such as name, address, or active status.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a SAVETUBA_ADMIN.

404.description: Not Found if the school ID does not exist.

409.description: Conflict if the new school name already exists.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a school. This operation will fail if the school has any associated users.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a SAVETUBA_ADMIN.

404.description: Not Found if the school ID does not exist.

409.description: Conflict if the school cannot be deleted due to associated users.

put.description: Uploads a new profile picture for the current user. Accepts multipart/form-data. The old picture, if it exists, will be deleted. Returns a short-lived presigned URL to the new avatar.

400.description: Bad Request if the file is invalid (e.g., wrong format, too large).

put.description: Changes the password for the currently authenticated user. All active sessions (refresh tokens) will be invalidated.

400.description: Bad Request if the current password is incorrect or the new password is the same as the old one.

get.description: Retrieves the profile information for the currently authenticated user.

put.description: Updates the first name and last name of the currently authenticated user.

400.description: Bad Request if validation on name fields fails.

delete.description: Permanently anonymizes and deactivates the current user's account. This action is irreversible and requires password confirmation.

400.description: Bad Request if the provided password is incorrect.

403.description: Forbidden for certain roles like SAVETUBA_ADMIN or School Admins who still manage a school.

get.description: Returns lesson info with activities. Activities don't include content.

put.summary: Update an existing lesson with an optional thumbnail file
put.description: Updates lesson fields. Uses multipart/form-data. One part named 'request' contains the JSON data. Another optional part named 'file' contains the new thumbnail image.

file.description: New thumbnail file for the lesson (optional)

get.summary: Get grade level details with paginated chapters
get.description: Returns grade level info with paginated chapters. Chapters don't include lessons. The 'isLastPage' field indicates if there are more chapters to load.

put.description: Updates grade level fields. If translations are updated, returns multi-language response with all updated translations.

get.summary: Get chapter details with paginated lessons
get.description: Returns chapter info with paginated lessons. Lessons don't include activities. The 'isLastPage' field indicates if there are more lessons to load.

put.summary: Update an existing chapter with an optional icon file
put.description: Updates chapter fields. Uses multipart/form-data. One part named 'request' contains the JSON data. Another optional part named 'file' contains the new icon image.

file.description: New icon file for the chapter (optional)

get.description: Returns activity info with content.

put.summary: Update an existing activity with an optional icon file
put.description: Updates activity fields. Uses multipart/form-data. One part named 'request' contains the JSON data. Another optional part named 'file' contains the new icon image.

file.description: New icon file for the activity (optional)

put.description: Updates the content (title, prompt, and image) for Snapshot, Image Boom, or Mastery activities. Uses multipart/form-data.

file.description: New image file for the activity (optional)

put.summary: Set/Update Sorting content for an activity
put.description: Replaces the entire sorting content for the specified activity.

put.summary: Set/Update Reorder content for an activity
put.description: Replaces the entire reorder content for the specified activity.

put.summary: Set/Update Quiz content for an activity
put.description: Replaces the entire quiz content for the specified activity.

put.summary: Set/Update Memory Game content for an activity
put.description: Replaces the entire memory game content for the specified activity.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific classroom, including lists of teachers and students. The current user must be a member of the classroom.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a member of the classroom.

404.description: Not Found if the classroom ID does not exist.

put.description: Allows a TEACHER who is a member of the classroom to update its name and description.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a teacher in this classroom.

404.description: Not Found if the classroom ID does not exist.

delete.description: Allows a TEACHER to archive their classroom. The classroom will no longer be active or visible to students.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a teacher in this classroom.

404.description: Not Found if the classroom ID does not exist.

get.description: Get detailed information about an assignment
Retrieves a paginated list of all schools in the system.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of schools.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a SAVETUBA_ADMIN.

post.description: Creates a new school in the system.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a SAVETUBA_ADMIN.

409.description: Conflict if a school with the same name already exists.

post.summary: Assign a user as a School Administrator
post.description: Assigns an existing user with the 'ADMIN' role to be the administrator of a specific school.

400.description: Bad Request if the user does not have the ADMIN role.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a SAVETUBA_ADMIN.

404.description: Not Found if the school or user ID does not exist.

409.description: Conflict if the school already has an admin or the user is already an admin of another school.

post.summary: Create an invitation for a School Administrator
post.description: Generates a single-use invitation link for a new user to register as an administrator for a specific school.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a SAVETUBA_ADMIN.

404.description: Not Found if the school ID does not exist.

409.description: Conflict if the school already has an administrator.

post.summary: Create a new lesson with an optional thumbnail file
post.description: Creates a new lesson. Uses multipart/form-data. One part named 'request' contains the JSON data. Another optional part named 'file' contains the thumbnail image.

get.summary: Get all active grade levels with pagination
get.description: Returns a simplified paginated list of grade levels. Response contains only 'content' array and 'isLastPage' boolean. Parameters (page, size, sort) are not echoed back in response.

post.description: Creates a new grade level. Returns grade level info with all created language translations, with createdAt but without updatedAt timestamp.

post.summary: Create a new chapter with an optional icon file
post.description: Creates a new chapter. Uses multipart/form-data. One part named 'request' contains the JSON data. Another optional part named 'file' contains the icon image.

post.summary: Upload a media asset for content
post.description: Uploads a single image or audio file and returns its identifier (object name) to be used in content creation.

post.summary: Create a new activity with an optional icon file
post.description: Creates a new activity. Uses multipart/form-data. One part named 'request' contains the JSON data. Another optional part named 'file' contains the icon image.
Allows a TEACHER to create a new classroom. The classroom is automatically associated with the teacher's school.

400.description: Bad Request if validation fails or grade level is not found.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a TEACHER.

post.description: Allows a TEACHER to transfer ownership of their classroom to another teacher within the same school.

400.description: Bad Request if the new teacher is invalid (not a teacher, not in the same school).

403.description: Forbidden if the current user is not the owner of the classroom.

404.description: Not Found if the classroom or new teacher does not exist.

post.summary: Join a classroom with a code
post.description: Allows a STUDENT to join an existing, active classroom using its unique code.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a STUDENT.

404.description: Not Found if no active classroom matches the provided code.

409.description: Conflict if the student is already a member of the classroom.

post.description: Allows a STUDENT to leave a classroom they have joined.

403.description: Forbidden if the user is not a STUDENT.

404.description: Not Found if the student is not enrolled in the specified classroom.

post.description: Registers a new user. Public registration defaults to the 'STUDENT' role. If a valid 'inviteToken' is provided, the user is assigned a role and school based on the invitation.

parameters.name: inviteToken
parameters.description: An optional invitation token for registering with a specific role (e.g., TEACHER or ADMIN).

200.description: User registered successfully. Returns an access token and sets a refresh token in an httpOnly cookie.

404.description: Not Found if the inviteToken is invalid or expired.

409.description: Conflict if a user with the provided email already exists.

post.description: Uses the httpOnly 'refreshToken' cookie to generate a new access token and a new refresh token (token rotation).

401.description: Unauthorized if the refresh token is missing, invalid, or expired.

post.summary: Log in or register with an OAuth2 provider
post.description: Handles authentication using an OAuth2 provider like Google. If the user does not exist, a new user with the 'STUDENT' role is created.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The name of the OAuth2 provider (e.g., 'google').

400.description: Bad Request if the provider is unsupported or the token is invalid.

post.description: Invalidates the current session's refresh token from the server and clears the httpOnly cookie.
Authenticates a user with email and password. On success, returns an access token and sets a refresh token in an httpOnly cookie.
Generates a short-lived access token for an anonymous guest user.
Refreshes an expired guest token to get a new one. The provided token must be an expired guest token.

400.description: Bad Request if the token is not a valid, expired guest token.

Teacher reviews a submission (approve/reject/reset)

post.summary: Assign a teacher to a classroom
post.description: Assigns a teacher to a classroom within the admin's school. The classroom must not have a teacher currently assigned.

404.description: Not Found if classroom or teacher ID is incorrect.
